title: Textile, 1851–63
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave
description:
A) Ground divided into broad stripes, one fancy ground of gray with small rosebuds in darker gray; broad white stripe with stiff green foliage bearing pink bell-shaped blossoms. 
B) Similar ground plan but with broad blue stripe made of diamond shapes.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1851–63.Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave. 1967-10-15-a.
